title: Before Flesh
description: From USA Today best-selling author Sky Corgan comes the riveting prequel to the Flesh series, told from Lucian Reddick's point of view.Lucian Reddick has just lost his family in a tragic shooting. The pain he feels inside is almost too immense to bear, and he only knows of one way to drown it out. Sex is quickly becoming not enough, though. He needs something more. Something darker.
author: Sky Corgan
